dependent_to.name: fujitsu-fftw
dependent_to.description:
FFTW (Fujitsu Optimized version) is a comprehensive collection of fast C
routines for computing the Discrete Fourier Transform (DFT) and various
special cases thereof. It is an open-source implementation of the Fast
Fourier transform algorithm. It can compute transforms of real and
complex-values arrays of arbitrary size and dimension. Fujitsu Optimized
FFTW is the optimized FFTW implementation targeted for A64FX CPUs. For
single precision build, please use precision value as float. Example :
spack install fujitsufftw precision=float

dependent_to.name: x11perf
dependent_to.description: Simple X server performance benchmarker.

dependent_to.name: nseg
dependent_to.description: NSEG - Low complexity sequence identification

dependent_to.name: qoz
dependent_to.description:
Quality optimized version of SZ3 is the next generation of the SZ
compressor framework

dependent_to.name: gimp
dependent_to.description:
GIMP is a cross-platform image editor available for GNU/Linux, macOS,
Windows and more operating systems. It is free software, you can change
its source code and distribute your changes. Whether you are a graphic
designer, photographer, illustrator, or scientist, GIMP provides you
with sophisticated tools to get your job done. You can further enhance
your productivity with GIMP thanks to many customization options and 3rd
party plugins.

dependent_to.name: premake-core
dependent_to.description:
Premake is a command line utility which reads a scripted definition of a
software project, then uses it to perform build configuration tasks or
generate project files for toolsets like Visual Studio, Xcode, and GNU
Make. Premake's scripts are little Lua programs, so the sky's the limit!

dependent_to.name: libibumad
dependent_to.description:
This package installs the user-space libraries and headers for
libibumad. This is a subset of the linux-rdma distribution.

dependent_to.name: arrow
dependent_to.description:
A cross-language development platform for in-memory data. This package
contains the C++ bindings.

dependent_to.name: cpio
dependent_to.description:
GNU cpio copies files into or out of a cpio or tar archive and the file
system. The archive can be another file on the disk, a magnetic tape, or
a pipe.

dependent_to.name: sparse
dependent_to.description: An open source sparse linear equation solver.

dependent_to.name: meshkit
dependent_to.description:
MeshKit is an open-source library of mesh generation functionality. Its
design philosophy is two-fold: it provides a collection of meshing
algorithms for use in real meshing problems, along with other tools
commonly needed to support mesh generation

dependent_to.name: cronie
dependent_to.description:
Cronie contains the standard UNIX daemon crond that runs specified
programs at scheduled times and related tools.

dependent_to.name: iozone
dependent_to.description:
IOzone is a filesystem benchmark tool. The benchmark generates and
measures a variety of file operations. Iozone has been ported to many
machines and runs under many operating systems.

dependent_to.name: libmaus2
dependent_to.description: libmaus2 is a collection of data structures and algorithmse.

dependent_to.name: open3d
dependent_to.description: Open3D: A Modern Library for 3D Data Processing.

dependent_to.name: virtuoso
dependent_to.description:
Virtuoso is a high-performance and scalable Multi-Model RDBMS, Data
Integration Middleware, Linked Data Deployment, and HTTP Application
Server Platform

dependent_to.name: irep
dependent_to.description:
IREP is a tool that enables mixed-language simulation codes to use a
common, Lua-based format for their input decks. Essentially, the input
format is a set of tables -- Lua's one (and only?) data structure.

dependent_to.name: callpath
dependent_to.description:
Library for representing callpaths consistently in distributed-memory
performance tools.

dependent_to.name: superlu-dist
dependent_to.description:
A general purpose library for the direct solution of large, sparse,
nonsymmetric systems of linear equations on high performance machines.

dependent_to.name: swarm
dependent_to.description: A robust and fast clustering method for amplicon-based studies.

dependent_to.name: buddy
dependent_to.description: A Binary Decision Diagram library.

dependent_to.name: libpaper
dependent_to.description:
The paper library and accompanying files are intended to provide a
simple way for applications to take actions based on a system- or user-
specified paper size.

dependent_to.name: exawind
dependent_to.description: Multi-application driver for Exawind project.

dependent_to.name: ocamlbuild
dependent_to.description:
OCamlbuild is a generic build tool, that has built-in rules for building
OCaml library and programs.

dependent_to.name: mesquite
dependent_to.description:
Mesquite (Mesh Quality Improvement Toolkit) is designed to provide a
stand-alone, portable, comprehensive suite of mesh quality improvement
algorithms and components that can be used to construct custom quality
improvement algorithms. Mesquite provides a robust and effective mesh
improvement toolkit that allows both meshing researchers application
scientists to benefit from the latest developments in mesh quality
control and improvement.

dependent_to.name: jwt-cpp
dependent_to.description:
A header only library for creating and validating JSON Web Tokens in
C++11.

dependent_to.name: freefem
dependent_to.description:
FreeFEM is a popular 2D and 3D partial differential equations (PDE)
solver. It allows you to easily implement your own physics modules using
the provided FreeFEM language. FreeFEM offers a large list of finite
elements, like the Lagrange, Taylor-Hood, etc., usable in the continuous
and discontinuous Galerkin method framework.

dependent_to.name: bash
dependent_to.description: The GNU Project's Bourne Again SHell.

dependent_to.name: libpressio-tthresh
dependent_to.description: A tthresh implementation for libpressio

dependent_to.name: fastani
dependent_to.description:
Fast, alignment-free computation of whole-genome Average Nucleotide
Identity (ANI)

dependent_to.name: panda
dependent_to.description: PANDA: Parallel AdjaceNcy Decomposition Algorithm

dependent_to.name: py-dgl
dependent_to.description:
Deep Graph Library (DGL). DGL is an easy-to-use, high performance and
scalable Python package for deep learning on graphs. DGL is framework
agnostic, meaning if a deep graph model is a component of an end-to-end
application, the rest of the logics can be implemented in any major
frameworks, such as PyTorch, Apache MXNet or TensorFlow.

dependent_to.name: heffte
dependent_to.description: Highly Efficient FFT for Exascale

dependent_to.name: fpchecker
dependent_to.description:
FPChecker (Floating-Point Checker) is a dynamic analysis tool to detect
floating-point errors in HPC applications.

dependent_to.name: libhio
dependent_to.description:
libHIO is a flexible, high-performance parallel IO package developed at
LANL. libHIO supports IO to either a conventional PFS or to Cray
DataWarp with management of Cray DataWarp space and stage-in and stage-
out from and to the PFS.

dependent_to.name: fastx-toolkit
dependent_to.description:
The FASTX-Toolkit is a collection of command line tools for Short-Reads
FASTA/FASTQ files preprocessing.

dependent_to.name: clapack
dependent_to.description:
CLAPACK is a f2c'ed version of LAPACK. The CLAPACK library was built
using a Fortran to C conversion utility called f2c. The entire Fortran
77 LAPACK library is run through f2c to obtain C code, and then modified
to improve readability. CLAPACK's goal is to provide LAPACK for someone
who does not have access to a Fortran compiler.

dependent_to.name: masa
dependent_to.description:
MASA (Manufactured Analytical Solution Abstraction) is a library written
in C++ (with C, python and Fortran90 interfaces) which provides a suite
of manufactured solutions for the software verification of partial
differential equation solvers in multiple dimensions.

dependent_to.name: ectrans
dependent_to.description:
Ectrans is the global spherical Harmonics transforms library, extracted
from the IFS. It is using a hybrid of MPI and OpenMP parallelisation
strategies. The package contains both single- and double precision
Fortran libraries (trans_sp, trans_dp), as well as a C interface to the
double-precision version (transi_dp).

dependent_to.name: ioapi
dependent_to.description: Models-3/EDSS Input/Output Applications Programming Interface.

dependent_to.name: diffmark
dependent_to.description: Diffmark is a DSL for transforming one string to another.

dependent_to.name: scalasca
dependent_to.description:
Scalasca is a software tool that supports the performance optimization
of parallel programs by measuring and analyzing their runtime behavior.
The analysis identifies potential performance bottlenecks - in
particular those concerning communication and synchronization - and
offers guidance in exploring their causes.

dependent_to.name: libraw1394
dependent_to.description:
libbraw1394 provides direct access to the IEEE 1394 bus through the
Linux 1394 subsystem's raw1394 user space interface.

dependent_to.name: gperf
dependent_to.description:
GNU gperf is a perfect hash function generator. For a given list of
strings, it produces a hash function and hash table, in form of C or C++
code, for looking up a value depending on the input string. The hash
function is perfect, which means that the hash table has no collisions,
and the hash table lookup needs a single string comparison only.

dependent_to.name: gptl
dependent_to.description:
GPTL is a library to instrument C, C++, and Fortran codes for
performance analysis and profiling.

dependent_to.name: batctl
dependent_to.description: B.A.T.M.A.N. advanced control and management tool

dependent_to.name: pblat
dependent_to.description: Parallelized blat with multi-threads support

dependent_to.name: bml
dependent_to.description:
The basic matrix library (bml) is an implementation of various matrix
data formats (dense and sparse) and their associated algorithms for
basic matrix operations used electronic structure solvers.

dependent_to.name: xfs
dependent_to.description: X Font Server.

dependent_to.name: squid
dependent_to.description: C function library for sequence analysis.

dependent_to.name: libbsd
dependent_to.description:
This library provides useful functions commonly found on BSD systems,
and lacking on others like GNU systems, thus making it easier to port
projects with strong BSD origins, without needing to embed the same code
over and over again on each project.

dependent_to.name: hiprand
dependent_to.description:
The hipRAND project provides an interface for generating pseudo-random
and quasi-random numbers with either cuRAND or rocRAND backends.

dependent_to.name: libcap-ng
dependent_to.description: Libcap-ng is a library that makes using posix capabilities easier

dependent_to.name: mdsplus
dependent_to.description:
A set of software tools for data acquisition and storage and a
methodology for management of complex scientific data.

dependent_to.name: libgcrypt
dependent_to.description: Cryptographic library based on the code from GnuPG.

dependent_to.name: pcl
dependent_to.description:
The Point Cloud Library (PCL) is a standalone, large scale, open project
for 2D/3D image and point cloud processing.

dependent_to.name: libbigwig
dependent_to.description:
A C library for reading/parsing local and remote bigWig and bigBed
files.

dependent_to.name: argobots
dependent_to.description:
Argobots, which was developed as a part of the Argo project, is a
lightweight runtime system that supports integrated computation and data
movement with massive concurrency. It will directly leverage the lowest-
level constructs in the hardware and OS: lightweight notification
mechanisms, data movement engines, memory mapping, and data placement
strategies. It consists of an execution model and a memory model.

dependent_to.name: xfsdump
dependent_to.description: XFS Dump Tools.

dependent_to.name: stressapptest
dependent_to.description:
Stressful Application Test (or stressapptest, its unix name) is a
memory interface test. It tries to maximize randomized traffic to memory
from processor and I/O, with the intent of creating a realistic high
load situation in order to test the existing hardware devices in a
computer. It has been used at Google for some time and now it is
available under the apache 2.0 license.

dependent_to.name: parthenon
dependent_to.description:
A performance portable block-structured adaptive mesh refinement
framework.

dependent_to.name: authselect
dependent_to.description: Select authentication and indentity profile to use on the system.

dependent_to.name: string-view-lite
dependent_to.description:
A single-file header-only version of a C++17-like string_view for
C++98, C++11 and later

dependent_to.name: oclgrind
dependent_to.description: An OpenCL device simulator and debugger.

dependent_to.name: draco
dependent_to.description:
Draco is an object-oriented component library geared towards numerically
intensive, radiation (particle) transport applications built for
parallel computing hardware. It consists of semi-independent packages
and a robust build system.

dependent_to.name: rempi
dependent_to.description: ReMPI is a record-and-replay tool for MPI applications.

dependent_to.name: hsakmt-roct
dependent_to.description:
This is a thunk python recipe to build and install Thunk Interface.
Thunk Interface is a user-mode API interfaces used to interact with the
ROCk driver.

dependent_to.name: xmlto
dependent_to.description:
Utility xmlto is a simple shell script for converting XML files to
various formats. It serves as easy to use command line frontend to make
fine output without remembering many long options and searching for the
syntax of the backends.

dependent_to.name: star
dependent_to.description: STAR is an ultrafast universal RNA-seq aligner.

dependent_to.name: numap
dependent_to.description:
Numap is a Linux library dedicated to memory profiling based on hardware
performance monitoring unit (PMU).

dependent_to.name: zfs
dependent_to.description:
OpenZFS is an advanced file system and volume manager which was
originally developed for Solaris and is now maintained by the OpenZFS
community. This repository contains the code for running OpenZFS on
Linux and FreeBSD.

dependent_to.name: albany
dependent_to.description:
Albany is an implicit, unstructured grid, finite element code for the
solution and analysis of multiphysics problems. The Albany repository on
the GitHub site contains hundreds of regression tests and examples that
demonstrate the code's capabilities on a wide variety of problems
including fluid mechanics, solid mechanics (elasticity and plasticity),
ice-sheet flow, quantum device modeling, and many other applications.

dependent_to.name: libdap4
dependent_to.description:
libdap4 is is a c++ library to serve as a client for the OPeNDAP
framework that simplifies all aspects of scientific data networking and
provides software which makes local data accessible to remote locations
regardless of local storage format.

dependent_to.name: erne
dependent_to.description: The Extended Randomized Numerical alignEr using BWT

dependent_to.name: xdbedizzy
dependent_to.description:
xdbedizzy is a demo of the X11 Double Buffer Extension (DBE) creating a
double buffered spinning scene.

dependent_to.name: elmerfem
dependent_to.description:
Elmer is an open source multiphysical simulation software. It includes
physical models of fluid dynamics, structural mechanics,
electromagnetics, heat transfer and acoustics.

dependent_to.name: datamash
dependent_to.description:
GNU datamash is a command-line program which performs basic numeric,
textual and statistical operations on input textual data files.

dependent_to.name: grass
dependent_to.description:
GRASS GIS (Geographic Resources Analysis Support System), is a free and
open source Geographic Information System (GIS) software suite used for
geospatial data management and analysis, image processing, graphics and
maps production, spatial modeling, and visualization.

dependent_to.name: sosflow
dependent_to.description:
SOSflow provides a flexible, scalable, and programmable framework for
observation, introspection, feedback, and control of HPC applications.

dependent_to.name: wtdbg2
dependent_to.description: A fuzzy Bruijn graph approach to long noisy reads assembly

dependent_to.name: hoppet
dependent_to.description:
A Fortran 95 package for carrying out QCD DGLAP evolution and other
common manipulations of parton distribution functions (PDFs).

dependent_to.name: exabayes
dependent_to.description:
ExaBayes is a software package for Bayesian tree inference. It is
particularly suitable for large-scale analyses on computer clusters.

dependent_to.name: exuberant-ctags
dependent_to.description: The canonical ctags generator

dependent_to.name: hipfft
dependent_to.description:
hipFFT is an FFT marshalling library. Currently, hipFFT supports either
rocFFT or cuFFT as backends.hipFFT exports an interface that does not
require the client to change, regardless of the chosen backend. It sits
between the application and the backend FFT library, marshalling inputs
into the backend and results back to the application.

dependent_to.name: xf86driproto
dependent_to.description:
XFree86 Direct Rendering Infrastructure Extension. This extension
defines a protocol to allow user applications to access the video
hardware without requiring data to be passed through the X server.

dependent_to.name: talloc
dependent_to.description:
Talloc provides a hierarchical, reference counted memory pool system
with destructors. It is the core memory allocator used in Samba.

dependent_to.name: seal
dependent_to.description:
Microsoft SEAL is an easy-to-use open-source (MIT licensed) homomorphic
encryption library developed by the Cryptography and Privacy Research
Group at Microsoft. Microsoft SEAL is written in modern standard C++ and
is easy to compile and run in many different environments. For more
information about the Microsoft SEAL project, see sealcrypto.org.

dependent_to.name: riscv-gnu-toolchain
dependent_to.description: A cross-compilation tool for RISC-V.

dependent_to.name: sblim-sfcc
dependent_to.description: Small Footprint CIM Client Library

dependent_to.name: scs
dependent_to.description: A C package that solves convex cone problems via operator splitting

dependent_to.name: mmv
dependent_to.description:
Move/Copy/Append/Link multiple files mmv is a program to
move/copy/append/link multiple files according to a set of wildcard
patterns. This multiple action is performed safely, i.e. without any
unexpected deletion of files due to collisions of target names with
existing filenames or with other target names.

dependent_to.name: dotconf
dependent_to.description: dot.conf configuration file parser.

dependent_to.name: bigreqsproto
dependent_to.description:
Big Requests Extension. This extension defines a protocol to enable the
use of requests that exceed 262140 bytes in length.

dependent_to.name: redland
dependent_to.description: Redland RDF Library - librdf providing the RDF API and triple stores

dependent_to.name: pinfo
dependent_to.description: Pinfo is user-friendly, console-based viewer for Info documents.

dependent_to.name: faircmakemodules
dependent_to.description:
CMake Modules developed in the context of various FAIR
(https://www.gsi.de/en/researchaccelerators/fair) projects

dependent_to.name: knem
dependent_to.description:
KNEM is a Linux kernel module enabling high-performance intra-node MPI
communication for large messages.

dependent_to.name: libkcapi
dependent_to.description: libkcapi allows user-space to access the Linux kernel crypto API.

dependent_to.name: tabix
dependent_to.description: Generic indexer for TAB-delimited genome position files

dependent_to.name: nnvm
dependent_to.description:
nnvm is a modular, decentralized and lightweight part to help build deep
learning libraries.

dependent_to.name: metall
dependent_to.description: A Persistent Memory Allocator For Data-Centric Analytics

dependent_to.name: timemory
dependent_to.description:
Modular profiling toolkit and suite of libraries and tools for
C/C++/Fortran/CUDA/Python

dependent_to.name: xtrap
dependent_to.description: XTrap sample clients.

dependent_to.name: libwmf
dependent_to.description:
libwmf is a library for reading vector images in Microsft's native
Windows Metafile Format (WMF)

dependent_to.name: apfel
dependent_to.description:
APFEL is a library able to perform DGLAP evolution up to NNLO in QCD and
to NLO in QED, both with pole and MSbar masses. The coupled DGLAP
QCD+QED evolution equations are solved in x-space by means of higher
order interpolations and Runge-Kutta techniques.

dependent_to.name: ensmallen
dependent_to.description:
ensmallen is a high-quality C++ library for non-linear numerical
optimization. ensmallen provides many types of optimizers that can be
used for virtually any numerical optimization task. This includes
gradient descent techniques, gradient-free optimizers, and constrained
optimization. ensmallen also allows optional callbacks to customize the
optimization process.

dependent_to.name: dftd3-lib
dependent_to.description:
A dispersion correction for density functionals, Hartree-Fock and semi-
empirical quantum chemical methods

dependent_to.name: scrnsaverproto
dependent_to.description:
MIT Screen Saver Extension. This extension defines a protocol to control
screensaver features and also to query screensaver info on specific
windows.

dependent_to.name: parallel-netcdf
dependent_to.description:
PnetCDF (Parallel netCDF) is a high-performance parallel I/O library for
accessing files in format compatibility with Unidata's NetCDF,
specifically the formats of CDF-1, 2, and 5.

dependent_to.name: xbitmaps
dependent_to.description:
The xbitmaps package contains bitmap images used by multiple
applications built in Xorg.

dependent_to.name: berkeley-db
dependent_to.description: Oracle Berkeley DB

dependent_to.name: libssh
dependent_to.description: libssh: the SSH library

dependent_to.name: cups
dependent_to.description:
CUPS is the standards-based, open source printing system developed by
Apple Inc. for macOS and other UNIX-like operating systems. CUPS uses
the Internet Printing Protocol (IPP) to support printing to local and
network printers. This provides the core CUPS libraries, not a complete
CUPS install.

dependent_to.name: uchardet
dependent_to.description:
uchardet is an encoding detector library, which takes a sequence of
bytes in an unknown character encoding without any additional
information, and attempts to determine the encoding of the text.
Returned encoding names are iconv-compatible.

dependent_to.name: unittest-cpp
dependent_to.description:
UnitTest++ is a lightweight unit testing framework for C++. It was
designed to do test-driven development on a wide variety of platforms.
Simplicity, portability, speed, and small footprint are all very
important aspects of UnitTest++. UnitTest++ is mostly standard C++ and
makes minimal use of advanced library and language features, which means
it should be easily portable to just about any platform.

dependent_to.name: cosma
dependent_to.description: Distributed Communication-Optimal Matrix-Matrix Multiplication Library

dependent_to.name: cpp-argparse
dependent_to.description: Argument Parser for Modern C++

dependent_to.name: batchedblas
dependent_to.description:
Batched BLAS is one of the new approaches for a task-based BLAS
invocation, and it is defined as a new interface that allows users to
execute multiple independent BLAS operations as a single subroutine call

dependent_to.name: cbtf-krell
dependent_to.description:
CBTF Krell project contains collector and runtime contributions to the
CBTF project. These contributions include many performance data
collectors and support libraries as well as some example tools that
drive the data collection at HPC levels of scale.

dependent_to.name: openvkl
dependent_to.description:
Intel® Open Volume Kernel Library is a collection of high-performance
volume computation kernels, developed at Intel.

dependent_to.name: mpas-model
dependent_to.description:
The Model for Prediction Across Scales (MPAS) is a collaborative project
for developing atmosphere, ocean and other earth-system simulation
components for use in climate, regional climate and weather studies.

dependent_to.name: bamaddrg
dependent_to.description:
bamaddrg adds read groups to input BAM files, streams BAM output on
stdout

dependent_to.name: libxau
dependent_to.description:
The libXau package contains a library implementing the X11 Authorization
Protocol. This is useful for restricting client access to the display.

dependent_to.name: utf8proc
dependent_to.description:
A clean C library for processing UTF-8 Unicode data: normalization,
case-folding, graphemes, and more

dependent_to.name: dalton
dependent_to.description:
Molecular electronic-structure program with extensive functionality for
calculations of molecular properties at the HF, DFT, MCSCF, MC-srDFT,
and CC levels of theory.

dependent_to.name: mrchem
dependent_to.description:
MRChem is a numerical real-space code for molecular electronic structure
calculations within the self-consistent field (SCF) approximations of
quantum chemistry: Hartree-Fock and Density Functional Theory.

dependent_to.name: trexio
dependent_to.description: TREXIO: TREX I/O library.

dependent_to.name: erlang
dependent_to.description:
Erlang is a programming language and runtime system for building
massively scalable soft real-time systems with requirements on high
availability.

dependent_to.name: revbayes
dependent_to.description:
Bayesian phylogenetic inference using probabilistic graphical models and
an interpreted language.

dependent_to.name: metabat
dependent_to.description:
MetaBAT, an efficient tool for accurately reconstructing single genomes
from complex microbial communities.

dependent_to.name: hdf5-vol-log
dependent_to.description:
Log-based VOL - an HDF5 VOL Plugin that stores HDF5 datasets in a log-
based storage layout.

dependent_to.name: memkind
dependent_to.description:
The memkind library is a user extensible heap manager built on top of
jemalloc which enables control of memory characteristics and a
partitioning of the heap between kinds of memory. The kinds of memory
are defined by operating system memory policies that have been applied
to virtual address ranges. Memory characteristics supported by memkind
without user extension include control of NUMA and page size features.
The jemalloc non-standard interface has been extended to enable
specialized arenas to make requests for virtual memory from the
operating system through the memkind partition interface. Through the
other memkind interfaces the user can control and extend memory
partition features and allocate memory while selecting enabled features.

dependent_to.name: fast-global-file-status
dependent_to.description:
provides a scalable mechanism to retrieve such information of a file,
including its degree of distribution or replication and consistency.

dependent_to.name: googletest
dependent_to.description: Google test framework for C++. Also called gtest.

dependent_to.name: ross
dependent_to.description: Rensselaer Optimistic Simulation System

dependent_to.name: xcmiscproto
dependent_to.description:
XC-MISC Extension. This extension defines a protocol that provides Xlib
two ways to query the server for available resource IDs.

dependent_to.name: edm4hep
dependent_to.description: Event data model of Key4hep.

dependent_to.name: mt-metis
dependent_to.description:
mt-Metis is a multithreaded multilevel graph partitioning an ordering
tool. It is based on the algorithms used in Metis and ParMetis

dependent_to.name: xinput
dependent_to.description: xinput is a utility to configure and test XInput devices.

dependent_to.name: ncio
dependent_to.description:
This is a library used by NCEP GSI system to read the GFS forecast files
for use in data assimilation. This is part of NOAA's NCEPLIBS project.

dependent_to.name: bwtool
dependent_to.description: bwtool is a command-line utility for bigWig files.

dependent_to.name: mxml
dependent_to.description:
Mini-XML is a small XML library that you can use to read and write XML
and XML-like data files in your application without requiring large non-
standard libraries.

dependent_to.name: cnmem
dependent_to.description: CNMem mempool for CUDA devices

dependent_to.name: fabtests
dependent_to.description:
Fabtests provides a set of runtime analysis tools and examples that use
libfabric.

dependent_to.name: libtiff
dependent_to.description: LibTIFF - Tag Image File Format (TIFF) Library and Utilities.

dependent_to.name: isl
dependent_to.description:
isl (Integer Set Library) is a thread-safe C library for manipulating
sets and relations of integer points bounded by affine constraints.

dependent_to.name: libnftnl
dependent_to.description:
A library for low-level interaction with nftables Netlink's API over
libmnl.

dependent_to.name: uvw
dependent_to.description:
uvw is a header-only, event based, tiny and easy to use libuv wrapper in
modern C++.

dependent_to.name: f3d
dependent_to.description: A fast and minimalist scriptable 3D viewer.

dependent_to.name: simgrid
dependent_to.description:
SimGrid is a framework for developing simulators of distributed
applications targetting distributed platforms, which can in turn be used
to prototype, evaluate and compare relevant platform configurations,
system designs, and algorithmic approaches.

dependent_to.name: rocm-core
dependent_to.description:
rocm-core is a utility which can be used to get ROCm release version. It
also provides the Lmod modules files for the ROCm release.
getROCmVersion function provides the ROCm version.

dependent_to.name: magma
dependent_to.description:
The MAGMA project aims to develop a dense linear algebra library similar
to LAPACK but for heterogeneous/hybrid architectures, starting with
current "Multicore+GPU" systems.

dependent_to.name: lis
dependent_to.description:
Lis (Library of Iterative Solvers for linear systems, pronounced [lis])
is a parallel software library for solving discretized linear equations
and eigenvalue problems that arise in the numerical solution of partial
differential equations using iterative methods.

dependent_to.name: unuran
dependent_to.description: Universal Non-Uniform Random number generator.

dependent_to.name: viennarna
dependent_to.description:
The ViennaRNA Package consists of a C code library and several stand-
alone programs for the prediction and comparison of RNA secondary
structures.

dependent_to.name: task
dependent_to.description: Feature-rich console based todo list manager

dependent_to.name: libnsl
dependent_to.description:
This library contains the public client interface for NIS(YP) and NIS+
in a IPv6 ready version.

dependent_to.name: npth
dependent_to.description:
nPth is a library to provide the GNU Pth API and thus a non-preemptive
threads implementation.

dependent_to.name: kokkos
dependent_to.description:
Kokkos implements a programming model in C++ for writing performance
portable applications targeting all major HPC platforms.

dependent_to.name: meme
dependent_to.description:
The MEME Suite allows the biologist to discover novel motifs in
collections of unaligned nucleotide or protein sequences, and to perform
a wide variety of other motif-based analyses.

dependent_to.name: gosam-contrib
dependent_to.description: Additional libraries for GoSam MC generator

dependent_to.name: datatransferkit
dependent_to.description:
DataTransferKit is an open-source software library of parallel solution
transfer services for multiphysics simulations

dependent_to.name: pdal
dependent_to.description:
PDAL is a C++ library for translating and manipulating point cloud data.
It is very much like the GDAL library which handles raster and vector
data.

dependent_to.name: ninja-phylogeny
dependent_to.description:
NINJA is software for inferring large-scale neighbor-joining
phylogenies.

dependent_to.name: isa-l-crypto
dependent_to.description:
ISA-L_crypto is a collection of optimized low-level functions targeting
storage applications. ISA-L_crypto includes: - Multi-buffer hashes - run
multiple hash jobs together on one core for much better throughput than
single-buffer versions. + SHA1, SHA256, SHA512, MD5 - Multi-hash - Get
the performance of multi-buffer hashing with a single-buffer interface.
- Multi-hash + murmur - run both together. - AES - block ciphers + XTS,
GCM, CBC - Rolling hash - Hash input in a window which moves through the
input

dependent_to.name: log4cpp
dependent_to.description:
Log4cpp is library of C++ classes for flexible logging to files, syslog,
IDSA and other destinations. It is modeled after the Log4j Java library,
staying as close to their API as is reasonable.

dependent_to.name: pestpp
dependent_to.description:
PEST++ is a software suite aimed at supporting complex numerical models
in the decision-support context. Much focus has been devoted to
supporting environmental models (groundwater, surface water, etc) but
these tools are readily applicable to any computer model.

dependent_to.name: h5z-zfp
dependent_to.description:
A highly flexible floating point and integer compression plugin for the
HDF5 library using ZFP compression.

dependent_to.name: whizard
dependent_to.description:
WHIZARD is a program system designed for the efficient calculation of
multi-particle scattering cross sections and simulated event samples.

dependent_to.name: hdf5-vol-external-passthrough
dependent_to.description: Package for HDF5 external pass-through VOL.

dependent_to.name: xeyes
dependent_to.description: xeyes - a follow the mouse X demo, using the X SHAPE extension

dependent_to.name: samblaster
dependent_to.description:
A tool to mark duplicates and extract discordant and split reads from
sam files.

dependent_to.name: hunspell
dependent_to.description: The most popular spellchecking library (sez the author...).

dependent_to.name: kripke
dependent_to.description:
Kripke is a simple, scalable, 3D Sn deterministic particle transport
proxy/mini app.

dependent_to.name: stress-ng
dependent_to.description:
stress-ng will stress test a computer system in various selectable ways.
It was designed to exercise various physical subsystems of a computer as
well as the various operating system kernel interfaces.

dependent_to.name: jchronoss
dependent_to.description:
JCHRONOSS aims to help HPC application testing process to scale as much
as the application does.

dependent_to.name: r-hdf5array
dependent_to.description:
HDF5 backend for DelayedArray objects. Implements the HDF5Array and
TENxMatrix classes, 2 convenient and memory-efficient array-like
containers for on-disk representation of HDF5 datasets. HDF5Array is for
datasets that use the conventional (i.e. dense) HDF5 representation.
TENxMatrix is for datasets that use the HDF5-based sparse matrix
representation from 10x Genomics (e.g. the 1.3 Million Brain Cell
Dataset). Both containers being DelayedArray extensions, they support
all operations supported by DelayedArray objects. These operations can
be either delayed or block-processed.

dependent_to.name: dpdk
dependent_to.description:
DPDK is a set of libraries and drivers for fast packet processing. It
supports many processor architectures and both FreeBSD and Linux.

dependent_to.name: netkit-ftp
dependent_to.description: netkit-ftp is the original file transfer client program for Linux.

dependent_to.name: jedi-cmake
dependent_to.description: CMake/ecbuild toolchains to facilitate portability on different systems.

dependent_to.name: branson
dependent_to.description:
Branson's purpose is to study different algorithms for parallel Monte
Carlo transport. Currently it contains particle passing and mesh passing
methods for domain decomposition.

dependent_to.name: dmxproto
dependent_to.description:
Distributed Multihead X (DMX) Extension. This extension defines a
protocol for clients to access a front-end proxy X server that controls
multiple back-end X servers making up a large display.

dependent_to.name: mpitrampoline
dependent_to.description:
MPItrampoline: A forwarding MPI implementation that can use any other
MPI implementation via an MPI ABI.

dependent_to.name: infernal
dependent_to.description:
Infernal (INFERence of RNA ALignment) is for searching DNA sequence
databases for RNA structure and sequence similarities. It is an
implementation of a special case of profile stochastic context-free
grammars called covariance models (CMs).

dependent_to.name: satsuma2
dependent_to.description:
Satsuma2 is an optimsed version of Satsuma, a tool to reliably align
large and complex DNA sequences providing maximum sensitivity (to find
all there is to find), specificity (to only find real homology) and
speed (to accomodate the billions of base pairs in vertebrate genomes).

dependent_to.name: lcms
dependent_to.description:
Little cms is a color management library. Implements fast transforms
between ICC profiles. It is focused on speed, and is portable across
several platforms (MIT license).

dependent_to.name: muscle
dependent_to.description:
MUSCLE is one of the best-performing multiple alignment programs
according to published benchmark tests, with accuracy and speed that are
consistently better than CLUSTALW.

dependent_to.name: votca-csgapps
dependent_to.description:
Versatile Object-oriented Toolkit for Coarse-graining Applications
(VOTCA) is a package intended to reduce the amount of routine work when
doing systematic coarse-graining of various systems. The core is written
in C++. This package contains the VOTCA coarse-graining extra apps.

dependent_to.name: stat
dependent_to.description: Library to create, manipulate, and export graphs Graphlib.

dependent_to.name: arrayfire
dependent_to.description:
ArrayFire is a high performance software library for parallel computing
with an easy-to-use API. Its array based function set makes parallel
programming more accessible.

dependent_to.name: portage
dependent_to.description:
Portage is a framework that computational physics applications can use
to build a highly customized, hybrid parallel (MPI+X) conservative
remapping library for transfer of field data between meshes.

dependent_to.name: fastp
dependent_to.description:
A tool designed to provide fast all-in-one preprocessing for FastQ
files.

dependent_to.name: prism
dependent_to.description:
PRISM is a probabilistic model checker, a tool for formal modelling and
analysis of systems that exhibit random or probabilistic behaviour.

dependent_to.name: py-xpyb
dependent_to.description:
xpyb provides a Python binding to the X Window System protocol via
libxcb.

dependent_to.name: imath
dependent_to.description:
Imath is a basic, light-weight, and efficient C++ representation of 2D
and 3D vectors and matrices and other simple but useful mathematical
objects, functions, and data types common in computer graphics
applications, including the "half" 16-bit floating-point type.

dependent_to.name: costa
dependent_to.description:
Distributed Communication-Optimal Matrix Transpose and Reshuffle
Library Based on the paper: https://arxiv.org/abs/2106.06601

dependent_to.name: xedit
dependent_to.description: Xedit is a simple text editor for X.

dependent_to.name: medipack
dependent_to.description:
MeDiPack (Message Differentiation Package) is a tool that handles the
MPI communication of Algorithmic Differentiation (AD) tools like
CoDiPack.

dependent_to.name: liblas
dependent_to.description:
libLAS is a C/C++ library for reading and writing the very common LAS
LiDAR format.

dependent_to.name: tinker
dependent_to.description:
The Tinker molecular modeling software is a complete and general package
for molecular mechanics and dynamics, with some special features for
biopolymers.

dependent_to.name: rt-tests
dependent_to.description:
Suite of real-time tests - cyclictest, hwlatdetect, pip_stress,
pi_stress, pmqtest, ptsematest, rt-migrate-test, sendme, signaltest,
sigwaittest, svsematest.

dependent_to.name: ibm-databroker
dependent_to.description:
The Data Broker (DBR) is a distributed, in-memory container of key-value
stores enabling applications in a workflow to exchange data through one
or more shared namespaces. Thanks to a small set of primitives,
applications in a workflow deployed in a (possibly) shared nothing
distributed cluster, can easily share and exchange data and messages
with applications.

dependent_to.name: coinutils
dependent_to.description:
CoinUtils is an open-source collection of classes and helper functions
that are generally useful to multiple COIN-OR projects.

dependent_to.name: geant3
dependent_to.description:
Simulation software using Monte Carlo methods to describe how particles
pass through matter.

dependent_to.name: scine-sparrow
dependent_to.description:
Sparrow: fast semiempirical quantum chemical calculations. When
publishing results obtained with Sparrow, please cite the corresponding
release as archived on Zenodo (DOI 10.5281/zenodo.3244105; please use
the DOI of the respective release). In addition, we kindly request you
to cite the following article when using Sparrow: T. Husch, A. C.
Vaucher, M. Reiher, "Semiempirical molecular orbital models based on the
neglect of diatomic differential overlap approximation", Int. J. Quantum
Chem., 2018, 118, e25799.

dependent_to.name: mosh
dependent_to.description:
Remote terminal application that allows roaming, supports intermittent
connectivity, and provides intelligent local echo and line editing of
user keystrokes. Mosh is a replacement for SSH. It's more robust and
responsive, especially over Wi-Fi, cellular, and long-distance links.

dependent_to.name: hiptt
dependent_to.description: hipTT - Fast GPU Tensor Transpose for NVIDIA and AMD GPU.

dependent_to.name: isc-dhcp
dependent_to.description:
ISC DHCP offers a complete open source solution for implementing DHCP
servers, relay agents, and clients. ISC DHCP supports both IPv4 and
IPv6, and is suitable for use in high-volume and high-reliability
applications.

dependent_to.name: cubist
dependent_to.description:
Cubist is a powerful tool for generating rule-based models that balance
the need for accurate prediction against the requirements of
intelligibility. Cubist models generally give better results than those
produced by simple techniques such as multivariate linear regression,
while also being easier to understand than neural networks.

dependent_to.name: libsigcpp
dependent_to.description: Libsigc++ is a C++ library for typesafe callbacks

dependent_to.name: screen
dependent_to.description:
Screen is a full-screen window manager that multiplexes a physical
terminal between several processes, typically interactive shells.

dependent_to.name: adol-c
dependent_to.description:
A package for the automatic differentiation of first and higher
derivatives of vector functions in C and C++ programs by operator
overloading.

dependent_to.name: cgdb
dependent_to.description: A curses front-end to GDB

dependent_to.name: sqlitebrowser
dependent_to.description:
DB Browser for SQLite (DB4S) is a high quality, visual, open source tool
to create, design, and edit database files compatible with SQLite.

dependent_to.name: libestr
dependent_to.description: C library for string handling (and a bit more).

dependent_to.name: libcerf
dependent_to.description:
A self-contained C library providing complex error functions, based on
Faddeeva's plasma dispersion function w(z). Also provides Dawson's
integral and Voigt's convolution of a Gaussian and a Lorentzian

dependent_to.name: yaml-cpp
dependent_to.description: A YAML parser and emitter in C++

dependent_to.name: photospline
dependent_to.description:
Library for interpolating multi-dimensional detector response
histograms.

dependent_to.name: snap-berkeley
dependent_to.description:
SNAP is a fast and accurate aligner for short DNA reads. It is optimized
for modern read lengths of 100 bases or higher, and takes advantage of
these reads to align data quickly through a hash-based indexing scheme.

dependent_to.name: libunwind
dependent_to.description:
A portable and efficient C programming interface (API) to determine the
call-chain of a program.

dependent_to.name: xcompmgr
dependent_to.description:
xcompmgr is a sample compositing manager for X servers supporting the
XFIXES, DAMAGE, RENDER, and COMPOSITE extensions. It enables basic eye-
candy effects.

dependent_to.name: qthreads
dependent_to.description:
The qthreads API is designed to make using large numbers of threads
convenient and easy, and to allow portable access to threading
constructs used in massively parallel shared memory environments. The
API maps well to both MTA-style threading and PIM-style threading, and
we provide an implementation of this interface in both a standard SMP
context as well as the SST context. The qthreads API provides access to
full/empty-bit (FEB) semantics, where every word of memory can be marked
either full or empty, and a thread can wait for any word to attain
either state.

dependent_to.name: sw4
dependent_to.description: This package builds SW4 with MPI, OpenMP, HDF5, FFTW, PROJ, and ZFP.

dependent_to.name: feh
dependent_to.description:
feh is an X11 image viewer aimed mostly at console users. Unlike most
other viewers, it does not have a fancy GUI, but simply displays images.
It is controlled via commandline arguments and configurable key/mouse
actions.

dependent_to.name: openmm
dependent_to.description:
A high performance toolkit for molecular simulation. Use it as a
library, or as an application. We include extensive language bindings
for Python, C, C++, and even Fortran. The code is open source and
actively maintained on Github, licensed under MIT and LGPL. Part of the
Omnia suite of tools for predictive biomolecular simulation.

dependent_to.name: stream
dependent_to.description:
The STREAM benchmark is a simple synthetic benchmark program that
measures sustainable memory bandwidth (in MB/s) and the corresponding
computation rate for simple vector kernels.

dependent_to.name: librttopo
dependent_to.description:
The RT Topology Library exposes an API to create and manage standard
(ISO 13249 aka SQL/MM) topologies using user-provided data stores.

dependent_to.name: hepmc
dependent_to.description:
The HepMC package is an object oriented, C++ event record for High
Energy Physics Monte Carlo generators and simulation.

dependent_to.name: fontcacheproto
dependent_to.description: X.org FontcacheProto protocol headers.

dependent_to.name: portcullis
dependent_to.description: PORTable CULLing of Invalid Splice junctions

dependent_to.name: cppgsl
dependent_to.description: C++ Guideline Support Library

dependent_to.name: git-lfs
dependent_to.description:
Git LFS is a system for managing and versioning large files in
association with a Git repository. Instead of storing the large files
within the Git repository as blobs, Git LFS stores special "pointer
files" in the repository, while storing the actual file contents on a
Git LFS server.

dependent_to.name: libtree
dependent_to.description: ldd as a tree

dependent_to.name: p3dfft3
dependent_to.description:
P3DFFT++ (a.k.a. P3DFFT v. 3) is a new generation of P3DFFT library that
aims to provide a comprehensive framework for simulating multiscale
phenomena. It takes the essence of P3DFFT further by creating an
extensible, modular structure uniquely adaptable to a greater range of
use cases.

dependent_to.name: hdf5-vfd-gds
dependent_to.description: This package enables GPU Direct Storage Virtual File Driver in HDF5.

dependent_to.name: circe2
dependent_to.description:
Circe2 is a beam spectrum generator that provides efficient, realistic
and reproducible parametrizations of the correlated e+/e- and gamma beam
spectra for linear colliders and photon colliders.

dependent_to.name: netlib-lapack
dependent_to.description:
LAPACK version 3.X is a comprehensive FORTRAN library that does linear
algebra operations including matrix inversions, least squared solutions
to linear sets of equations, eigenvector analysis, singular value
decomposition, etc. It is a very comprehensive and reputable package
that has found extensive use in the scientific community.

dependent_to.name: ipopt
dependent_to.description:
Ipopt (Interior Point OPTimizer, pronounced eye-pea-Opt) is a software
package for large-scale nonlinear optimization.

dependent_to.name: guile
dependent_to.description:
Guile is the GNU Ubiquitous Intelligent Language for Extensions, the
official extension language for the GNU operating system.

dependent_to.name: mrbayes
dependent_to.description:
MrBayes is a program for Bayesian inference and model choice across a
wide range of phylogenetic and evolutionary models. MrBayes uses Markov
chain Monte Carlo (MCMC) methods to estimate the posterior distribution
of model parameters.

dependent_to.name: hyperscan
dependent_to.description: High-performance regular expression matching library.

dependent_to.name: vapor
dependent_to.description:
VAPOR is the Visualization and Analysis Platform for Ocean, Atmosphere,
and Solar Researchers. VAPOR provides an interactive 3D visualization
environment that can also produce animations and still frame images.

dependent_to.name: osi
dependent_to.description:
Osi (Open Solver Interface) provides an abstract base class to a generic
linear programming (LP) solver, along with derived classes for specific
solvers. Many applications may be able to use the Osi to insulate
themselves from a specific LP solver. That is, programs written to the
OSI standard may be linked to any solver with an OSI interface and
should produce correct results. The OSI has been significantly extended
compared to its first incarnation. Currently, the OSI supports linear
programming solvers and has rudimentary support for integer programming.

dependent_to.name: miniocli
dependent_to.description:
MinIO Client (mc) provides a modern alternative to UNIX commands like
ls, cat, cp, mirror, diff etc. It supports filesystems and Amazon S3
compatible cloud storage service (AWS Signature v2 and v4).

dependent_to.name: gtksourceview
dependent_to.description:
GtkSourceView is a GNOME library that extends GtkTextView, the standard
GTK+ widget for multiline text editing. GtkSourceView adds support for
syntax highlighting, undo/redo, file loading and saving, search and
replace, a completion system, printing, displaying line numbers, and
other features typical of a source code editor.

dependent_to.name: libp11
dependent_to.description:
The PKCS#11 API is an abstract API to perform operations on
cryptographic objects such as private keys, without requiring access to
the objects themselves. That is, it provides a logical separation of the
keys from the operations. The PKCS #11 API is mainly used to access
objects in smart cards and Hardware or Software Security Modules (HSMs).
That is because in these modules the cryptographic keys are isolated in
hardware or software and are not made available to the applications
using them.

dependent_to.name: mcl
dependent_to.description:
The MCL algorithm is short for the Markov Cluster Algorithm, a fast and
scalable unsupervised cluster algorithm for graphs (also known as
networks) based on simulation of (stochastic) flow in graphs.

dependent_to.name: tcl-tclxml
dependent_to.description:
TclXML is an API for parsing XML documents using the Tcl scripting
language. It is also a package including a DOM implementation (TclDOM)
and XSL Transformations (TclXSLT). These allow Tcl scripts to read,
manipulate and write XML documents.

dependent_to.name: llvm-amdgpu
dependent_to.description:
Toolkit for the construction of highly optimized compilers, optimizers,
and run-time environments.

dependent_to.name: xf86dga
dependent_to.description: dga is a simple test client for the XFree86-DGA extension.

dependent_to.name: silo
dependent_to.description:
Silo is a library for reading and writing a wide variety of scientific
data to binary, disk files.

dependent_to.name: spades
dependent_to.description:
SPAdes - St. Petersburg genome assembler - is intended for both standard
isolates and single-cell MDA bacteria assemblies.

dependent_to.name: mgcfd-op2
dependent_to.description:
Package for the OP2 port of MGCFD: A 3D unstructured multigrid, finite-
volume computational fluid dynamics (CFD) mini-app for inviscid-flow.

dependent_to.name: sdl2
dependent_to.description:
Simple DirectMedia Layer is a cross-platform development library
designed to provide low level access to audio, keyboard, mouse,
joystick, and graphics hardware via OpenGL and Direct3D.

dependent_to.name: daligner
dependent_to.description: Daligner: The Dazzler "Overlap" Module.

dependent_to.name: ermod
dependent_to.description:
ERmod (Energy Representation Module) is a program to calculate the
solvation free energy based on the energy representation method. The
program allows users to calculate the solvation free energy to arbitrary
solvents, including inhomogeneous systems, and can run in cooperation
with state-of-art molecular simulation softwares, such as NAMD, GROMACS
and/or AMBER.

dependent_to.name: twm
dependent_to.description:
twm is a window manager for the X Window System. It provides titlebars,
shaped windows, several forms of icon management, user-defined macro
functions, click-to-type and pointer-driven keyboard focus, and user-
specified key and pointer button bindings.

dependent_to.name: hisea
dependent_to.description:
HISEA is an efficient all-vs-all long read aligner for SMRT sequencing
data. Its algorithm is designed to produce highest alignment sensitivity
among others.

dependent_to.name: imlib2
dependent_to.description:
Library that does image file loading and saving as well as rendering,
manipulation, arbitrary polygon support
